trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class creates a TCP/IP or UDP LDAP connection to Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services or an LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 클래스는 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인 서비스 또는 LDAP 서버에 대한 TCP/IP 또는 UDP LDAP 연결을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> 개체 및 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> 모두 설정에 지정 된 인증서 개체는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 연결 블록을 만들지 못하거나 서버에 대한 연결을 열지 못한 경우

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> 생성자는 지정된 디렉터리 식별자를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The logon credentials and the Negotiate Authentication are used to connect to the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 로그온 자격 증명과 협상 인증이 LDAP 서버에 연결하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 연결 블록을 만들지 못하거나 서버에 대한 연결을 열지 못한 경우

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
A string specifying the server which can be a domain name, LDAP server name or dotted strings representing the IP address of the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 서버를 지정하는 문자열로, 도메인 이름, LDAP 서버 이름 또는 LDAP 서버의 IP 주소를 나타내는 점으로 구분된 문자열일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, this parameter may also include a port number, separated from the right end of the string by a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 선택적으로 이 매개 변수에는 콜론(:)으로 열의 오른쪽 끝과 구분된 포트 번호가 포함될 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> 생성자는 지정된 서버를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 연결 블록을 만들지 못하거나 서버에 대한 연결을 열지 못한 경우

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 자격 증명을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier and network credentials.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> 생성자는 지정된 디렉터리 식별자와 네트워크 자격 증명을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Negotiate Authentication is used.
Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 연결 블록을 만들지 못하거나 서버에 대한 연결을 열지 못한 경우

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 자격 증명을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> values that specifies the type of authentication to use.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> 생성자는 지정된 디렉터리 식별자, 네트워크 자격 증명 및 인증 형식을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 연결 블록을 만들지 못하거나 서버에 대한 연결을 열지 못한 경우

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is specified as Anonymous but <paramref name="credential" /> specified credentials.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authType" />이 Anonymous로 지정되어 있지만 <paramref name="credential" />에서 자격 증명을 지정한 경우

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous request.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method cancels the asynchronous request.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Thrown if <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by the corresponding call to <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property contains the supported authentication types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 속성에는 지원되는 인증 형식이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A supported authentication type.
Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> property specifies whether an automatic bind is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> 속성은 자동 바인드가 허용되는지 여부를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automatic bind is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 자동 바인드가 허용되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to the server.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 일부 결과의 수준을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> 열거형의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 이 요청의 상태 데이터를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Object" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" />이 <see langword="null" />(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: Partial results are not supported.
A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="partialMode" />가 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />과 같을 때 콜백 함수를 지정하지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
The time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 요청 시간 제한이 초과되기 전까지의 시간(초)입니다.

trans-unit.source: A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 일부 결과의 수준을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> 열거형의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 이 요청의 상태 데이터를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Object" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Partial results are not supported.
A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="partialMode" />가 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />과 같을 때 콜백 함수를 지정하지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: Sends an LDAP bind.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the current credentials.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> 메서드는 현재 자격 증명을 사용하여 LDAP 바인드를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
The error code returned by LDAP does not map to one of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error codes.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드 중 하나에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> 속성이 인증을 위해 보낼 클라이언트 인증서를 둘 이상 지정하거나, <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 속성이 Anonymous이고 자격 증명이 하나 이상 제공되는 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 자격 증명을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> 메서드는 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />을 사용하여 LDAP 바인드를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> 속성이 인증을 위해 보낼 클라이언트 인증서를 둘 이상 지정하거나, <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 속성이 Anonymous이고 자격 증명이 하나 이상 제공되는 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> property contains the network credentials for the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> 속성에는 개체의 네트워크 자격 증명이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The network credentials for the object.
Closes and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose" /> method closes and releases the LDAP handle.
<see langword="true" /> if the handle is released when the connection is closed or <see langword="false" /> if the connection is closed without releasing the handle.
trans-unit.target: 연결이 닫힐 때 핸들이 해제되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 핸들을 해제하지 않고 연결이 닫히면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method closes the connection and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 메서드는 연결을 닫고 LDAP 핸들을 선택적으로 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 이 요청에 대한 상태 데이터를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method completes an asynchronous request.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the results of the request.
Thrown if the object is already disposed.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" />가 <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> 호출에서 반환된 <paramref name="asyncResult" />와 일치하지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 오류와 함께 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 개체를 반환한 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> method allows an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> 메서드를 사용하면 가비지 수집으로 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 개체를 회수하기 전에 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 개체가 리소스를 해제하고 다른 정리 작업을 수행하도록 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 이 요청에 대한 상태 데이터를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method retrieves partial results of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 메서드는 비동기 작업의 일부 결과를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection" /> object that contains the partial results.
The object is already disposed.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" />가 <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> 호출에서 반환된 <paramref name="asyncResult" />와 일치하지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 오류와 함께 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 개체를 반환한 경우

trans-unit.source: Sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> 메서드는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 하나를 LDAP v3 작업으로 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
The object is already disposed.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 오류와 함께 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 개체를 반환한 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
The length of time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 요청 시간 제한이 초과되기 전까지의 시간(초)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> 메서드는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 하나를 LDAP v3 작업으로 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
The object is already disposed.
The object handle is not valid.
<paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP에서 반환된 오류 코드가 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 열거형 오류 코드에 매핑되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 오류와 함께 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 개체를 반환한 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> property contains an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> 속성에는 세션 옵션을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> 개체가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.

If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> 개체 및 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> 모두 설정에 지정 된 인증서 개체는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> 속성은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> 속성에는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 시간 제한이 초과되기 전까지의 시간(초)이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
